trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento si verifica solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>proprietà è impostata o dai relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: La gestione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento è utile quando si desidera visualizzare un menu di scelta rapida determinato dallo stato corrente di una riga o i valori.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento, viene visualizzato il menu di scelta rapida che specifica nel gestore di ogni volta che l'utente fa una riga, a meno che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>override di eventi di menu di scelta rapida per la cella su cui è stato fatto clic.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento si verifica anche ogni volta che il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene recuperata, a livello di codice o quando l'utente fa una riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>proprietà per determinare lo stato di una riga o i valori e usare queste informazioni per modificare o cambiare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene inizializzata con il valore della riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>proprietà, che sostituisce il valore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento quando si lavora con grandi quantità di dati, per evitare il calo delle prestazioni dell'impostazione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>valore per più righe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `rowIndex` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore utilizza il `rowIndex` valore del parametro per inizializzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexè minore di -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il menu di scelta rapida per la riga che ha generato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà contiene inizialmente il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà se è stata impostata per una riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice della riga che richiede il menu di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve additional information about the row.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per recuperare informazioni aggiuntive sulla riga.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero della riga che richiede il menu di scelta rapida.
